Samsung has introduced its latest Galaxy Book laptops aimed at the many people working from home during the pandemic.

articles.title: WhatsApp Rolls Out Expanded Image Display in Messaging Threads - Social Media Today
articles.description: WhatsApp is rolling out a new update to the way images are displayed within message threads.
